snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s initiative adds support services, but the help may be too little and too slow for the most dysfunctional schools.
abstract: Editorial contends rescue plan for struggling schools unveiled by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio needs to be fleshed out in greater detail before it can be fully appraised; warns that plan might not be sufficient to remake city's lowest-achieving, most-dysfunctional schools.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s initiative adds support services, but the help may be too little and too slow for the most dysfunctional schools.

headline.print_headline: New York Needs a Stronger School Plan
headline.main: New York Needs a Stronger School Plan

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
